FactionDef.label: Fungi Tribe
FactionDef.description: Emerging from the shadows of anonymity, you rise to lead the tribe of xenophobic Fungis from the depths of obscurity. With a blank canvas before you, you embark on a journey to forge a new identity for your people. Blending the ancient wisdom of the Stone Age with your burgeoning knowledge of biological technology, you lay the groundwork for a tribe unlike any other. Through your guidance, the tribe learns to harness the power of spores and diseases, transforming them from mere survivors to masters of their environment. Together, you and your tribe chart a new path forward, ready to carve out a legacy that will echo through the ages.
